name: Slingshot Sheppard
description:
The E-Val Mining Corporation is going to mulch up this sector without any regard for the indigenous space goats that live there. Butch, a blue-collar space pilot, will not abide this.

As Butch, players will swing around planets, collect space rocks and hurl them at patrol ships, all to save every last space goat.

Controls:

Left Stick: Movement
Left Trigger: Aim Grapple (Hold) / Launch Grapple (Release)
Left Shoulder Button: Release/Cancel Grapple
Right Stick: Aim Attack or Grapple(while holding Left Trigger)
Rotate Right Stick: Charge Attack
Right Trigger: Fire Attack
Hold A: Retract Grapple
Hold B: Extend Grapple
